src:
Catatan Unik Kyle Walker sebagai Kiper Dadakan Manchester City, Layak jadi Kiper Inti?
07 Nov 2019, 09:42 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester City mengalami momen yang tidak biasa pada laga melawan Atalanta. Man City harus mengganti dua kipernya. Pada pergantian kedua, Josep Guardiola 'menyulap' bek kanan Kyle Walker menjadi penjaga gawang.
Manchester City menantang Atalanta di matchday keempat fase grup Liga Champions di San Siro, Kamis (7/11/2019) dini hari WIB. Man City sebenarnya datang mencari kemenangan agar bisa lolos ke babak 16 Besar.
Akan tetapi, Man City harus puas dengan raihan satu poin saja. Man City pulang dari Milan dengan hasil imbang 1-1. Bagi Atalanta, hasil ini membuat mereka meraih poin pertama di Liga Champions.
Man City unggul cepat pada menit ke-7 lewat gol Raheem Sterling. Lalu, Gabriel Jesus gagal menendang penalti pada menit 43. Atalanta baru bisa menyamakan kedudukan pada menit 49 melalui gol yang dicetak Mario Pasalic.
text:
Kyle Walker's Unique Notes as Manchester City's impromptu goalkeeper, deserve to be the core goalkeeper?
Nov 7 2019, 09:42 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester City experienced an unusual moment in the match against Atalanta. Man City must replace two of his goalkeepers. In the second turn, Josep Guardiola 'juggled' right-back Kyle Walker as goalkeeper.
Manchester City challenge Atalanta on the fourth phase of the Champions League group phase at the San Siro on Thursday (11/07/2019) early morning hrs. Man City actually came looking for victory in order to qualify for the Round of 16.
However, Man City must be satisfied with just one point. Man City returned from Milan with a 1-1 draw. For Atalanta, this result earned them the first point in the Champions League.
Man City took the lead in the 7th minute through Raheem Sterling's goal. Then, Gabriel Jesus failed to kick a penalty in minute 43. Atalanta could only equalize on 49 minutes through goals scored by Mario Pasalic.
